idNumber.title: Number
idNumber.description: The automatically generated number identifying this subscription.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The contracted start date for the subscription. You must specify the subscription-level start date, or it defaults to the current date. Defines the earliest possible activation date for the subscription line items. Remains editable until any subscription line item becomes active.

nextBillCycleDate.title: Next Bill Cycle Date
nextBillCycleDate.description: The next bill date for this Billing Account.

autoRenewal.title: Automatically Initiate Renewal Process
autoRenewal.description: Check this box to automatically renew the subscription. After checking this box, enter a date by which you want to renew the subscription before it expires. The renewal process can include negotiating pricing, subscription terms, and other subscription details.

subscriptionRevision.title: Subscription Revision
subscriptionRevision.description: The current revision number for the subscription. The revision number increases when you create a change order on the subscription. The first activation is revision 1. Another revision is created whenever a change order is saved.

lastBillCycleDate.title: Last Bill Cycle Date
lastBillCycleDate.description: The start date for the next billing cycle.

lastBillDate.title: Last Bill Date
lastBillDate.description: The date of the last invoice.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The contracted end of the subscription. For a standard-term subscription, equal to the subscription start date plus the indicated subscription term. For a custom-term subscription, the subscription-level end date also must be set at the subscription level.

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter a name to identify the subscription. If you leave this field blank, NetSuite automatically generates a subscription name upon saving.

nextRenewalStartDate.title: Next Renewal Start Date
nextRenewalStartDate.description: The start date for the next renewal of this subscription.
